TopicTitle: Old versions of KSP (some versions still wanted!)

Articles.Content: COOL! Might try some of these out like I did with Minecraft...trying the early Alphas

I actualy have a leaked version of pre-release 0.6.5 if anyone is interested.

It is pretty much the same of KSP 0.7.3 but with extra glitches and hugs. It also contains an old flight and editor tutorial. It, however, has the version 7.3 written. Ignore that as it was put that way by the devs.

Something quite bizarre to note is that there are two companies never seen in the actual game: Blenon Rocket Parts .inc and O.D.M, however, their parts, the Command Pod, Decoupler, etc. is not shown ingame, and is instead listed as found lying by the side of the road.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/bu2qggccpp2hsjb/AAApAMbwS7VAbignKOY-N3Nza?dl=0

Edited March 23, 2015 by Kirrim
Pssst. There's no such thing as 6.5.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/bu2qggccpp2hsjb/AAApAMbwS7VAbignKOY-N3Nza?dl=0

Take a look Vending.
Where did you get it?
I had found it on an old hard drive I found while I was out for a drive.

I had found it on an old hard drive I found while I was out for a drive.

Logical Part of Brain: Hmmm, something is fishy here, I AM SUSPICIOUS.

Gamer Part of Brain: I MUST FIND THE EARLIEST VERSION!!!!!!!!
Even the size of the executable is 6.5MB

Yeah. It didnt have much of a difference to the next version of it: 7.3, as it just had some stuff that wasnt added in and those tutorials. Take Blenon Rocket Parts for example.

Edited March 24, 2015 by Kirrim
Hey, can someone provide a different zip file format for the 0.13.3 version? I downloaded it, but my computer won't read .7z format! It only reads .zip files

Hey, can someone provide a different zip file format for the 0.13.3 version? I downloaded it, but my computer won't read .7z format! It only reads .zip files

Here's a download link for the program you need to read 7-zips.
thanks!
Sorry to bump this thread, but does anyone know whether one of these versions has the magic boulder?

No, none of these versions contain the magic boulder. I believe it was added afterwards by Nova (an old dev, in case you haven't been here too long) probably when he initially made the solar system (0.17). Also, the boulder orbited Ike (Duna's moon) so there is no way it would exist in such an early version of the game.

Sorry to be the bearer of bad news.
Why would you want an older version this far back? (Just wondering)
Nostaliga.

Why would you want an older version this far back? (Just wondering)

Just interest. I came to the party with 0.24.2 - I'd like to visit some older versions to see what "ye olde KSP" was like. Just like visiting a museum
Yup,playing 0.7.3 is like playing Blockland v0002.

I started playing RIGHT before 0.23, so checking the really old versions will be interesting !

Edited April 11, 2015 by Elowiny
Been here since 0.20 so it's fun to play this
Been here since 0.15.1, fun to play my old save file. From 2012. Wow. Such nostalgia.
Thanks everybody who helped with this.
Anyone have 0.90 sitting around somewhere? Please?

Anyone have 0.90 sitting around somewhere? Please?

That's illegal to give away. Only before 0.13

You can download 0.90 on the KSP store. Note that sharing any version after 0.13.3 breeches the terms of the lisence.

Can the 0.18.3 Demo be added here since it is no longer current?
